attributes.long_name: Number of 20Hz measurements : 01 Hz C band
attributes.comment: Number of 20-Hz measurements associated to the 1-Hz measurement.

attributes.long_name: altitude of the satellite : 20 Hz C band
attributes.comment: Altitude of satellite above the reference ellipsoid

attributes.long_name: orbital altitude rate : 20 Hz C band
attributes.comment: The reference surface for the orbital altitude rate is the combined mean_sea_surface/geoid surface. It is used to compute the Doppler correction on the altimeter range

attributes.long_name: altitude of the satellite : 20 Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: Altitude of satellite above the reference ellipsoid

attributes.long_name: orbital altitude rate : 20 Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: The reference surface for the orbital altitude rate is the combined mean_sea_surface/geoid surface. It is used to compute the Doppler correction on the altimeter range

attributes.long_name: UTC: 1 Hz
day UTC : 1 Hz
Second in the day UTC : 1 Hz
Index of the 1Hz measurement : 20 Hz C band
attributes.comment: Index of the 1-Hz measurement associated to the 20-Hz measurement, zero index corresponding to the first 1-Hz measurement of the dataset.

attributes.long_name: Index of the first 20Hz measurement : 01 Hz C band
attributes.comment: Index of the first 20-Hz measurement associated to the 1-Hz measurement, zero index corresponding to the first 20-Hz measurement of the dataset.

attributes.long_name: UTC: 20 Hz C band
day UTC : 20 Hz C band
UTC of the 1 Hz measurement
Index of the 1Hz measurement : 20 Hz ku band
attributes.comment: Index of the 1-Hz measurement associated to the 20-Hz measurement, zero index corresponding to the first 1-Hz measurement of the dataset.

attributes.long_name: Index of the first 20Hz measurement : 01 Hz ku band
attributes.comment: Index of the first 20-Hz measurement associated to the 1-Hz measurement, zero index corresponding to the first 20-Hz measurement of the dataset.

attributes.long_name: UTC: 20 Hz Ku band
day UTC : 20 Hz Ku band
UTC of the 1 Hz measurement
latitude : 1 Hz
attributes.comment: Positive latitude is North latitude, negative latitude is South latitude

attributes.long_name: longitude : 1 Hz
attributes.comment: East longitude relative to Greenwich meridian

attributes.long_name: latitude : 20 Hz C band
attributes.comment: Positive latitude is North latitude, negative latitude is South latitude

attributes.long_name: longitude : 20 Hz C band
attributes.comment: East longitude relative to Greenwich meridian

attributes.long_name: latitude : 20 Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: Positive latitude is North latitude, negative latitude is South latitude

attributes.long_name: longitude : 20 Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: East longitude relative to Greenwich meridian

attributes.long_name: corrected AGC : 20 Hz C band
attributes.comment: AGC corrected for instrumental errors (agc_cor_20_C). For SAR mode, value the closest in time to the reference measurement

attributes.long_name: quality flag for AGC : 20 Hz C band
attributes.comment: Flag indicating the use or not of the 20-Hz estimate of AGC in the computation of 1Hz estimate

attributes.long_name: scaling factor for backscatter coefficient evaluation : 20 Hz C band
attributes.comment: This scaling factor represents the backscatter coefficient for a waveform amplitude equal to 1. It is corrected for AGC instrumental errors (agc_cor_20_c) and internal calibration (sig0_cal_20_c)

attributes.long_name: corrected tracker range for : 20 Hz C band
attributes.comment: LRM mode : tracker range corrected for USO frequency drift (uso_cor_20_c), internal path and Doppler corrections (int_path_cor_20_c) and Doppler correction (dop_cor_l1b_20_c) SAR mode : reference range corrected for USO frequency drift (uso_cor_20_c) and internal path corrections (int_path_cor_20_c)

attributes.long_name: corrected AGC : 20 Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: AGC corrected for instrumental errors (agc_cor_20_ku). For SAR mode, value the closest in time to the reference measurement

attributes.long_name: quality flag for AGC : 20 Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: Flag indicating the use or not of the 20-Hz estimate of AGC in the computation of 1Hz estimate

attributes.long_name: altitude command H0 computed with nav / DEM : 20 Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: SAR mode : value the closest in time to the reference measurement

attributes.long_name: scaling factor for backscatter coefficient evaluation : 20 Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: This scaling factor represents the backscatter coefficient for a waveform amplitude equal to 1. It is corrected for AGC instrumental errors (agc_cor_20_ku) and internal calibration (sig0_cal_20_ku)

attributes.long_name: corrected tracker range for : 20 Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: LRM mode : tracker range corrected for USO frequency drift (uso_cor_20_ku), internal path and Doppler corrections (int_path_cor_20_ku) and Doppler correction (dop_cor_l1b_20_ku) SAR mode : reference range corrected for USO frequency drift (uso_cor_20_ku) and internal path corrections (int_path_cor_20_ku)

attributes.long_name: corrected AGC : 20 Hz Plrm Ku band
attributes.comment: AGC corrected for instrumental errors (agc_cor_20_plrm_ku). For SAR mode, value the closest in time to the reference measurement

attributes.long_name: quality flag for AGC : 20 Hz Plrm Ku band
attributes.comment: Flag indicating the use or not of the 20-Hz estimate of AGC in the computation of 1Hz estimate

attributes.long_name: scaling factor for backscatter coefficient evaluation : 20 Hz Plrm Ku band
attributes.comment: This scaling factor represents the backscatter coefficient for a waveform amplitude equal to 1. It is corrected for AGC instrumental errors (agc_cor_20_plrm_ku) and internal calibration (sig0_cal_20_plrm_ku)

attributes.long_name: corrected tracker range for : 20 Hz PLRM Ku band
attributes.comment: LRM/PLRM mode : tracker range corrected for USO frequency drift (uso_cor_20_c), internal path and Doppler corrections (int_path_cor_20_plrm_ku) and Doppler correction (dop_cor_l1b_20_plrm_ku) SAR mode : reference range corrected for USO frequency drift (uso_cor_20_c) and internal path corrections (int_path_cor_20_plrm_ku)

attributes.comment: LRM mode : ocean retracking, SAR mode : N.A.

attributes.comment: LRM mode : ocean retracking, SAR mode : ocean/coastal retracking.

attributes.comment: LRM mode : ocean retracking, SAR mode : ocean/coastal retracking

attributes.long_name: Number of iterations / 'ocean' retracking : 20 Hz C band
attributes.comment: LRM mode : ocean retracking, SAR mode : ocean/coastal retracking

attributes.long_name: corrected 'ocean' altimeter range : 20 Hz C band
attributes.comment: LRM mode : ocean retracking, SAR mode : ocean/coastal retracking. Instrumental corrections included : USO drift correction (uso_cor_20_c), internal path correction (int_path_cor_20_c), distance antenna-COG (cog_cor_01), Doppler correction (dop_cor_20_c), modeled instrumental errors correction (mod_instr_cor_range_01_c) and system bias

attributes.long_name: number of valid points used to compute the 'ocean' altimeter range : 1 Hz C band
attributes.comment: LRM mode : ocean retracking, SAR mode : ocean/coastal retracking

attributes.long_name: quality flag for the 'ocean' altimeter range : 20 Hz C band
attributes.comment: LRM mode : ocean retracking, SAR mode : ocean/coastal retracking. Flag indicating the use or not of the 20-Hz estimate of the ocean altimeter range in the computation of 1Hz estimate

attributes.long_name: RMS of the 'ocean' altimeter range : 1 Hz C band
attributes.comment: LRM mode : ocean retracking, SAR mode : ocean/coastal retracking. Compression of high rate elements is preceded by a detection of outliers. Only valid high-rate values are used to compute this element

attributes.long_name: corrected 'ocean' backscatter coefficient : 1 Hz C band
attributes.comment: LRM mode : ocean retracking, SAR mode : ocean/coastal retracking. Instrumental corrections included : AGC instrumental errors correction, internal calibration correction, modeled instrumental errors correction, atmospheric attenuation correction and system bias.

attributes.comment: LRM mode : ocean retracking, SAR mode : ocean/coastal retracking. attributes.comment: LRM mode : ocean retracking, SAR mode : ocean/coastal retracking

attributes.long_name: corrected altimeter elevation from OCOG (ice-1) retracker : 20 Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: LRM mode : OCOG (ice-1) retracking, SAR mode : OCOG (ice-1)  retracking. Instrumental corrections included : USO drift correction (uso_cor_[x1]_[x2]), internal path correction (int_path_cor_[x1]_[x2]),  distance antenna-COG (cog_cor_[x1]_[x2]) and Doppler slope correction (dop_slope_cor_[x1]_[x2]). Geophysical corrections included: GIM-derived ionospheric correction on Ku band (iono_cor_gim_[x1]_ku), model dry tropospheric correction (mod_dry_tropo_cor_meas_altitude_[x1]_[x2]),  model wet tropospheric correction (mod_wet_tropo_cor_meas_altitude_[x1]_[x2]), solid earth tide height (solid_earth_tide_[x1]_[x2]), geocentric ocean tide height solution 2 = FES (ocean_tide_sol2_[x1]_[x2], on ocean/semi-enclosed seas only)  , geocentric pole tide height (pole_tide_[x1]_[x2]) , ocean loading tide solution 2 = FES (load_tide_sol2_[x1]_[x2], on land only) inverted barometer height correction (inv_bar_cor_[x1] on ocean/semi-enclosed seas only) , high frequency fluctuations of the sea surface topography (hf_fluct_cor_[x1] for NTC/STC off line products only, on ocean/semi-enclosed seas only). A height slope correction is applied.

attributes.long_name: corrected ocog altimeter range : 20 Hz C band
attributes.comment: LRM mode; SAR mode :ocog retracking. Instrumental corrections included : USO drift correction (uso_cor_20_c), internal path correction (int_path_cor_20_c), distance antenna-COG

attributes.long_name: corrected ocog altimeter range : 20 Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: LRM mode; SAR mode :ocog retracking. Instrumental corrections included : USO drift correction (uso_cor_20_ku), internal path correction (int_path_cor_20_ku), distance antenna-COG

attributes.long_name: corrected 'sea ice' altimeter range : 20 Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: SAR mode only : sea-ice margin retracking. Instrumental corrections included : USO drift correction (uso_cor_20_ku), internal path correction (int_path_cor_20_ku), distance antenna-COG and Doppler slope correction (dop_slope_cor_20_ku)

attributes.long_name: corrected 'sea ice' backscatter coefficient : 20 Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: SAR mode only : sea-ice margin retracking. Instrumental corrections included : AGC instrumental errors correction (agc_cor_20_ku) and internal calibration correction (sig0_cal_20_ku)

attributes.long_name: altimeter-derived surface type classification: 20 Hz Ku band
Inverted barometer height correction : 1 Hz
attributes.comment: Computed at the altimeter time-tag from the interpolation of 2 meteorological fields that surround the altimeter time-tag.
attributes.source: European Center for Medium Range Weather Forecasting

attributes.long_name: model dry tropospheric correction at measurement altitude: 1 Hz
attributes.comment: Computed from 3d meteorological fields at measurement altitude, at the altimeter time-tag from the interpolation of 2 meteorological fields that surround the altimeter time-tag. A dry tropospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for dry tropospheric range delays of the radar pulse
attributes.source: European Center for Medium Range Weather Forecasting

attributes.long_name: model dry tropospheric correction at zero altitude: 1 Hz
attributes.comment: Computed from 3d meteorological fields at zero altitude, at the altimeter time-tag from the interpolation of 2 meteorological fields that surround the altimeter time-tag. A dry tropospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for dry tropospheric range delays of the radar pulse
attributes.source: European Center for Medium Range Weather Forecasting

attributes.long_name: model wet tropospheric correction at measurement altitude: 1 Hz
attributes.comment: Computed from 3d meteorological fields at measurement altitude, at the altimeter time-tag from the interpolation of 2 meteorological fields that surround the altimeter time-tag. A wet tropospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for wet tropospheric range delays of the radar pulse
attributes.source: European Center for Medium Range Weather Forecasting

attributes.long_name: model wet tropospheric correction at zero altitude: 1 Hz
attributes.comment: Computed from 3d meteorological fields at zero altitude, at the altimeter time-tag from the interpolation of 2 meteorological fields that surround the altimeter time-tag. A wet tropospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for wet tropospheric range delays of the radar pulse
attributes.source: European Center for Medium Range Weather Forecasting

attributes.long_name: Atmospheric attenuation correction on the backscatter coefficient: 1 Hz C band
Sea state bias correction : 1 Hz C band
attributes.comment: A sea state bias correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for sea state delays of the radar pulse.
attributes.source: Empirical solution fitted on Jason-2 GDR_C data

attributes.long_name: Atmospheric attenuation correction on the backscatter coefficient: 1 Hz Ku band
composite wet tropospheric correction: 1 Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: Computed at the altimeter time-tag from both radiometer and model corrections over areas where the radiometer wet troposphere correction is missing or supposed as invalid due to the proximity of emerged lands, coastal areas and/or radiometer gaps in open oceans. A wet tropospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for wet tropospheric range delays of the radar pulse

attributes.long_name: altimeter ionospheric correction: 20 Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for ionospheric range delays of the radar pulse. This correction is valid over ocean surfaces only

attributes.long_name: altimeter ionospheric range filtered: 1 Hz Ku Band
attributes.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for ionospheric range delays of the radar pulse. This correction is valid over ocean surfaces only

attributes.long_name: GIM ionospheric correction: 1 Hz
attributes.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for ionospheric range delays of the radar pulse.

attributes.long_name: radiometer wet tropospheric correction: 1 Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: A wet tropospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for wet tropospheric range delays of the radar pulse. This correction is valid over ocean surfaces only

attributes.long_name: radiometer wet tropospheric correction: 1 Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: Computed at the altimeter time-tag from the radiometer brightness temperatures, the Ku-band backscatter coefficient, the sea surface temperature and the lapse rate (decreasing rate of the atmosphere temperature with altitude). A wet tropospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for wet tropospheric range delays of the radar pulse

attributes.long_name: Sea state bias correction : 1 Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: A sea state bias correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for sea state delays of the radar pulse.
attributes.source: Empirical solution fitted on Jason-2 GDR_C data

attributes.long_name: Atmospheric attenuation correction on the backscatter coefficient: 1 Hz Plrm Ku band
composite wet tropospheric correction: 1 Hz Plrm Ku band
attributes.comment: Computed at the altimeter time-tag from both radiometer and model corrections over areas where the radiometer wet troposphere correction is missing or supposed as invalid due to the proximity of emerged lands, coastal areas and/or radiometer gaps in open oceans. A wet tropospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for wet tropospheric range delays of the radar pulse

attributes.long_name: altimeter ionospheric correction: 20 Hz Plrm Ku band
attributes.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for ionospheric range delays of the radar pulse. This correction is valid over ocean surfaces only

attributes.long_name: altimeter ionospheric range filtered: 1 Hz Plrm Ku Band
attributes.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for ionospheric range delays of the radar pulse. This correction is valid over ocean surfaces only

attributes.long_name: radiometer wet tropospheric correction: 1 Hz Plrm Ku band
attributes.comment: A wet tropospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for wet tropospheric range delays of the radar pulse. This correction is valid over ocean surfaces only

attributes.long_name: radiometer wet tropospheric correction: 1 Hz Plrm Ku band
attributes.comment: Computed at the altimeter time-tag from the radiometer brightness temperatures, the Ku-band backscatter coefficient, the sea surface temperature and the lapse rate (decreasing rate of the atmosphere temperature with altitude). A wet tropospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for wet tropospheric range delays of the radar pulse

attributes.long_name: Sea state bias correction : 1 Hz Plrm Ku band
attributes.comment: A sea state bias correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for sea state delays of the radar pulse.
attributes.source: Empirical solution fitted on Jason-2 GDR_C data

attributes.long_name: number of samples in the waveforms
attributes.comment: Set to be compliant with the CF-1.1 convention

attributes.long_name: maximum number of multilook beams per stack
attributes.comment: Set to be compliant with the CF-1.6 convention

attributes.long_name: look angles in stack: 20 Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: Look angles in stack: 20 Hz Ku band. These are looking angles and not beam angles. The useful values of the table are the first n_useful values where n_useful is the number of waveforms summed in stack (nb_stack_20_ku)

attributes.long_name: flag on beam formation quality in stack : 20 Hz Ku band
kurtosis of stack : 20 Hz Ku band
Location of the maximum power of stack : 20 Hz Ku band
maximum power of stack : 20 Hz Ku band
RIP, Range Integrated Power: l1b_echo_sar_ku mode
attributes.comment: the useful values of the table are the first nb_stack_l1b_echo_sar_ku values, one value of power for each individual echo

attributes.long_name: skewness of stack : 20 Hz Ku band
standard deviation of stack : 20 Hz Ku band
number of samples in I2+Q2 waveforms
attributes.comment: Set to be compliant with the CF-1.6 convention

attributes.long_name: Waveform samples (I2+Q2) : 20 Hz C band
attributes.comment: LRM mode Ku and C bands: the echo is corrected for the GPRW effect, SAR mode C band : the echo is the so-called averaged echo corrected for the GPRW effect,  SAR mode Ku band : the echo is corrected for Doppler range effect, phase/power burst calibration and GPWR effect

attributes.long_name: Waveform samples (I2+Q2) : 20 Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: LRM mode Ku and C bands: the echo is corrected for the GPRW effect, SAR mode C band : the echo is the so-called averaged echo corrected for the GPRW effect, SAR mode Ku band : the echo is corrected for Doppler range effect, phase/power burst calibration and GPWR effect

attributes.long_name: Waveform samples (I2+Q2) : 20 Hz Plrm Ku band
attributes.comment: LRM mode Ku and C bands: the echo is corrected for the GPRW effect, SAR mode C band : the echo is the so-called averaged echo corrected for the GPRW effect, SAR mode Plrm Ku band : the echo is corrected for Doppler range effect, phase/power burst calibration and GPWR effect

Net instrumental correction on the altimeter range : 20 Hz C band
attributes.comment: Sum of distance antenna-COG, USO drift correction (uso_cor_20_c), internal path correction (int_path_cor_20_c), L2 Doppler correction update (dop_cor_20_c - dop_cor_l1b_20_c),modeled instrumental errors correction (mod_instr_cor_range_01_c) and system bias

attributes.long_name: Net instrumental correction on the backscatter coefficient: 20 Hz C band
attributes.comment: Sum of AGC instrumental errors correction (agc_cor_20_c), internal calibration correction (sig0_cal_20_c), modeled instrumental errors correction (mod_instr_cor_sig0_01_c) and system bias.

attributes.long_name: Net instrumental correction on the significant waveheight: 20 Hz C band
attributes.comment: Sum of modeled instrumental errors correction (mod_instr_cor_swh_01_c) and system bias

Standard deviation of 23.8 GHz main beam brightness temperature: 01 Hz
36.5 GHz main beam brightness temperature: 1 Hz
Standard deviation of 36.5 GHz main beam brightness temperature: 01 Hz
radiometer derived surface type : 1 Hz
angle to the coast : 20 Hz Ku band
distance to the coast : 20 Hz Ku band
sea-ice concentration: 20 Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: Derived from a 3-day average of SSM/I daily brightness temperatures or if unavailable a static monthly climatology.

attributes.long_name: snow depth: 20 Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: Snow depth

attributes.long_name: surface classification : 20 Hz ku band
attributes.flag_meanings: open_ocean land continental_water aquatic_vegetation continental_ice_snow floating_ice salted_basin
attributes.comment: Computed from a mask built with MODIS and GlobCover data

attributes.long_name: surface type : 20 Hz Ku band
surface type : 20 Hz C band
Geoid height : 1 Hz
attributes.comment: Computed from the geoid model with a correction to refer the value to the mean tide system i.e. includes the permanent tide (zero frequency)

attributes.long_name: Load tide height for geocentric ocean tide (solution 1): 1 Hz
attributes.comment: This value has already been added to the corresponding ocean tide height value recorded in the product (ocean_tide_sol1_01).

attributes.long_name: Load tide height for geocentric ocean tide (solution 2): 1 Hz
attributes.comment: This value contains the total load tide height (short-period and long-period) for the geocentric ocean tide (solution 2). To get only the pure ocean tide height (solution 2), do: ocean_tide_sol2_01 + ocean_tide_non_eq_01 - load_tide_sol2_01. This value has already been added to the corresponding ocean tide height value recorded in the product (ocean_tide_sol2_01).

attributes.long_name: Equilibrium long-period ocean tide height : 1 Hz
attributes.comment: This value has already been added to the two geocentric ocean tide height values recorded in the product (ocean_tide_sol1_01 and ocean_tide_sol2_01). The permanent tide (zero frequency) is not included in this parameter because it is included in the geoid and mean sea surface (geoid_01, mean_sea_surf_sol1_01).
attributes.source: Cartwright and Edden [1973] Corrected tables of tidal harmonics - J. Geophys. J. R. Astr. Soc., 33, 253-264.

attributes.long_name: Non-equilibrium long-period ocean tide height : 1 Hz
attributes.comment: This parameter is computed as a correction to the parameter ocean_tide_eq_01; it contains the long-period ocean tide and the long-period load tide components. This value can be added to ocean_tide_eq_01 (or ocean_tide_sol1_01, ocean_tide_sol2_01) so that the resulting value models the total non equilibrium ocean tide height.

attributes.long_name: Geocentric ocean tide height (solution 1) : 1 Hz
attributes.comment: Solution 1 corresponds to GOT model. Includes the corresponding loading tide (load_tide_sol1_01) and equilibrium long-period ocean tide height (ocean_tide_eq_01). The permanent tide (zero frequency) is not included in this parameter because it is included in the geoid and mean sea surface (geoid_01, mean_sea_surf_sol1_01).

attributes.long_name: Geocentric ocean tide height (solution 2) : 1 Hz
attributes.comment: Solution 2 corresponds to FES model. Includes the corresponding short-period part of the loading tide (load_tide_sol2_01) and equilibrium long-period ocean tide height (ocean_tide_eq_01). The permanent tide (zero frequency) is not included in this parameter because it is included in the geoid and mean sea surface (geoid_01, mean_sea_surf_sol1_01).

attributes.long_name: Ocean depth/land elevation: 1 Hz
Geocentric tide height : 1 Hz
attributes.source: Wahr [1985] Deformation of the Earth induced by polar motion - J. Geophys. Res. (Solid Earth), 90, 9363-9368.

attributes.long_name: Solid earth tide height : 1 Hz
attributes.comment: Calculated using Cartwright and Tayler tables and consisting of the second and third degree constituents. The permanent tide (zero frequency) is not included.
attributes.source: Cartwright and Edden [1973] Corrected tables of tidal harmonics - J. Geophys. J. R. Astr. Soc., 33, 253-264.

attributes.long_name: U component of the model wind vector : 1 Hz
attributes.comment: Computed at the altimeter time-tag from the interpolation of 2 meteorological fields that surround the altimeter time-tag
attributes.source: European Center for Medium Range Weather Forecasting

attributes.long_name: V component of the model wind vector : 1 Hz
attributes.comment: Computed at the altimeter time-tag from the interpolation of 2 meteorological fields that surround the altimeter time-tag
attributes.source: European Center for Medium Range Weather Forecasting

attributes.comment: Should not be used over land

attributes.comment: Should not be used over land

Off nadir yaw angle derived from platform data: 1 Hz

Modeled instrumental correction on the square of the off-nadir angle: 1 Hz Ku band
number of valid points used to compute the off-nadir angle derived from waveforms: 1 Hz Ku band
RMS of the square of the off-nadir angle derived from waveforms: 1 Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: compression of high rate elements is preceded by a detection of outliers. Only valid high-rate values are used to compute this element

attributes.long_name: flag indicating the use or not of the 20 Hz estimate of the square of the off-nadir angle in the computation of 1Hz estimate: 20 Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: LRM mode : ocean retracking , SAR mode : ocean/coastal retracking

attributes.long_name: Validity flag for the square of the off nadir angle derived from waveforms: 1 Hz Ku band
Corrected square of the off nadir angle derived from waveforms: 1 Hz Plrm Ku band
attributes.comment: This parameter is issued from the ocean retracking in LRM mode and from the ocean/coastal retracking in SAR mode. It accounts for modeled instrumental errors correction  (mod_instr_cor_off_nadir_angle_01_plrm_ku) and system bias

attributes.long_name: Modeled instrumental correction on the square of the off-nadir angle: 1 Hz Plrm Ku band
number of valid points used to compute the off-nadir angle derived from waveforms: 1 Hz Plrm Ku band
RMS of the square of the off-nadir angle derived from waveforms: 1 Hz Plrm Ku band
attributes.comment: compression of high rate elements is preceded by a detection of outliers. Only valid high-rate values are used to compute this element

attributes.long_name: flag indicating the use or not of the 20 Hz estimate of the square of the off-nadir angle in the computation of 1Hz estimate: 20 Hz Plrm Ku band
attributes.comment: LRM mode : ocean retracking , SAR mode : ocean/coastal retracking

attributes.long_name: Validity flag for the square of the off nadir angle derived from waveforms: 1 Hz Plrm Ku band
